channel.title: Comments on: I Explain It All, Part 2

item.title: By: Mannox
item.dc:creator: Mannox
item.description:
Even more Chinese Farmers now? So lets do a little perspective math...
They have 700k Subscribers in a population base of 400 Million (USA) Since China has about triple our population we are looking at what another 2 Million Subscribers?
Now that gives Blizzard about 3.25 Million Subscribers at $15 a month they are pulling in $48.75 Million a month in Revenue. Staggering...truly staggering.
item.content:encoded:
Even more Chinese Farmers now? So lets do a little perspective math…

They have 700k Subscribers in a population base of 400 Million (USA) Since China has about triple our population we are looking at what another 2 Million Subscribers?

Now that gives Blizzard about 3.25 Million Subscribers at $15 a month they are pulling in $48.75 Million a month in Revenue. Staggering…truly staggering.
